name: NATIONAL COALITION AGAINST DOMESTIC VIOLENCE
govEntities: Bureau of Alcohol Tobacco Firearms & Explosives
sampleDescriptions: Advocate for bills that support victims and survivors and increase their access to quality health care. Reauthorizing the Family Violence Prevention and Services Act, which is administered by HHS, is

Lobbying on issues related to domestic violence, including the Violence Against Women Act, funding for domestic violence programs and appropriations and other bills that impact victims and survivors o

Promote bills to expand firearms prohibitors to cover dating violence and stalking (S.1539/H.R.3207 - Zero Tolerance for Domestic Abusers Act/Protecting Domestic Violence and Stalking Victims Act),imp
Advocate for VOCA tribal funding stream, protect special tribal jurisdiction within VAWA
Support increased funding for VAWA and other programs that impact victims and survivors; support legislation to keep firearms out of the hands of abusers
